      • convertInputStreamToString

        public static java.lang.String convertInputStreamToString(java.io.InputStream in)
                                                   throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                                          java.io.IOException
        Convert the given input stream into a string with the given encoding. Close the input stream on completion.
        Parameters:
        in - The input stream to convert to string.
        Returns:
        Return the string representation of the given input stream (UTF-8 encoded).
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.io.IOException

      • convertInputStreamToString

        public static java.lang.String convertInputStreamToString(java.io.InputStream in,
                                                          java.lang.String encoding,
                                                          boolean close)
                                                   throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                                          java.io.IOException
        Convert the given input stream into a string with the given encoding. Optionally close the input stream on completion.
        Parameters:
        in - The input stream to convert to string.
        encoding - The encoding used to read the stream bytes to string.
        close - Whether or not to close the input stream on completion of the read.
        Returns:
        Return the string representation of the given input stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.io.IOException
